column4: India's largest offshore drilling services provider to oil companies & also ventured into construction, offshore and onshore drilling, wind energy and power generation.
World's largest builder of electricity grids & its core businesses being in power and automation technologies.
An Ahmedabad-based shipbuilding company in India.
A foremost manufacturer of cement and ready mixed concrete
Its diversified businesses include resources, logistics, agribusiness and energy sectors.
India's largest private power producer and solar power producer
The Company is engaged in short-term accommodation activities, and restaurant and mobile food service activities.
Apollo Tyres is a leading car tyre manufacturers in India
Ajanta Pharma Limited is an emerging, global pharmaceutical company with proven capabilities in the areas of product research, manufacturing & marketing.
Allahabad Bank is a nationalised bank with its headquarters in Kolkata, India. It is the oldest joint stock bank in India.
Alchemist Limited  is an Indian conglomerate which has presence in multiple sectors such healthcare, pharmaceuticals, food-processing, real estate, infrastructure and tea estates.
Ambuja Cement is India's top cement manufacturing and supplier company.
Andhra Bank is a medium-sized public sector bank (PSB) of India, with a network of 2803 branches.
Apollo Hospitals is India's leading super speciality hospital.
Ashok Leyland is an India automobile manufacturing company and makes spare parts and engines for industrial and marine applications.
A paint company engaged in the business of manufacturing, selling and distribution of paints, coatings, products related to home decor, bath fittings and providing of related services.
Axis Bank offers internet banking services, personal banking services including accounts, cards, loans, investment options to personals, corporates and NRIs.
Bank of Baroda, India's International Bank Offers Internet Banking Services, Mobile Banking Services, Accounts, Loans, Financial Services to Corporates.
Bank of India (BoI) is commercial bank.
India's largest paint company & manufacturer, offering a wide range of wall painting & waterproofing
An Indian-based flagship company that operates four main divisions: cement, jute, vinoleum, and auto trim
Exporter of automotive electrical parts, motors, alternators, batteries, belts, filters service provider of car service garages.
Ceat Limited is a premium provider of tyres for a wide range of vehicles
Central Bank of India, a government-owned bank, is one of the oldest and largest commercial banks in India.
An Indian state-controlled coal mining company and the largest coal producer company in the world.
CRISIL is a global analytical company providing Ratings, Research and Risk & Policy Advisory services.
One of the top global pharmaceuticals companies in India, uses latest technology for high quality & affordable medicines for all patients.
Dish TV is India's largest Direct to Home television operator using MPEG 4 DVB S2 and MPEG 2 digital compression technology. It is a division of Zee Entertainment Enterprises.

The Company operates in energy, airports, transportation and has presence in other business, such as resources and urban infrastructures.
HDFC Bank Limited is an Indian banking and financial services company
Hero MotoCorp is the World's single largest two wheeler motorcycle manufacturer based in India.
Hindustan Unilever Limited is an Indian consumer goods company.Its products includes foods, beverages, cleaning agents, personal care products and water purifiers.
ICICI Bank is an Indian multinational banking and financial services company
Indian Oil Corporation is an Indian petrochemical company. It is the largest commercial enterprise in the country, with a net profit of 19,106 crore for the financial year 2016–17
J. K. Cement is one of the largest cement manufacturers in north India. It is also second largest producer of white cement in India.
The company has business interests in engineering, construction, manufacturing goods, information technology, and financial services, and has offices worldwide.

It is a diversified financial services firm offering a range of financial products and services such as Wealth Management, Retail Broking and Distribution, Institutional Broking, Asset Management, Private Equity, Investment Banking, Commodity Broking and Home Finance.

Nestlé is the world's largest food and beverage company.
Oil and Natural Gas Corporation Limited is an Indian multinational oil and gas company
Pfizer is one of the world's premier research-based biopharmaceutical companies.
Punjab National Bank is an Indian multinational banking and financial services company. It is a state-owned corporation.
PVR Limited is a film entertainment company in India.
Tata Motors Limited is the largest manufacturer in Indian automotive industry. It is the leader in commercial vehicles, and among the top in passenger vehicles.
Raymond Ltd is largest integrated manufacturer of worsted fabric in the world based in Mumbai, Maharashtra.
Reliance Communications Ltd. is an Indian telecommunications company that provides GSM mobile services, fixed line broadband and voice services, DTH services.
State Bank of India is an Indian multinational, public sector banking and financial services company. It is a government-owned corporation.
